entry.title: old post, only for historical reasons

link.title: old post, only for historical reasons

entry.content:
MyMindMap

Collect and structure all the information from various places.

The Orthogonality

Online courses

  • Udemy
  • SkillShare
  • Coursera
  • edX
  • MOOC.fi
  • DevOps with Docker
  • DevOps with Kubernetes
  • Full stack web development

Podcast

The Portal

Hosted by Eric Weinstein: ownWiki , Web , Youtube

Artifical Intelligence Podcast

Hosted by Lex Fridman: Youtube

PowerfulJRE

Hosted by Joe Rogan: Youtube

Az élet, meg minden

Hungarian long-format discussion, interviews: Web

nos autem predicamus

Hosted by Péter Koszoru: Castbox

Design tools

Fast Prototyping and testing

  • Just in Mind- All-in-one prototyping tool
  • Proto.io
  • User testing
    • UserTesting
    • UserLytics
    • Lookback.io
  • Screenspace: studio-quality product video generation
  • Material.io: google icon set
  • Placeit: Mockup generator site

Color palette generator

  • Flat UI Colors
  • Adobe Color
  • Colorsinspo

Stock image resources

  • Pixabay
  • Pexels
  • Freepik
  • Unsplash

Presentation

  • Beauiful.ai

Inspiration

  • DeepShape

History

  • Hardcore history podcast

Music

  • DAW (Digial Audio Workstation) online
  • Royalty Free Music, monthly subsciption
  • Map based radio

Poetry

Spoken word/ Slam poetry

  • Button poetry: Web, Youtube
  • SlamPoetry Budapest: Youtube

Professional tech job checks

  • Teamblind
  • Glassdoor
  • Tyba
  • Crunchbase
  • AngelList

Fun

  • Augur - Bet online
  • Visualising quaternions
  • Finnish nightmares
  • xkcd
  • PhD Comics

Typing

  • 10fastfingers
  • livechat-typing speed test
  • typingclub

Interior design

  • Kelly Wearstler website

Global warming

  • En-ROADS from Climate Interactive and MIT Sloan’s Sustainability Initiative

Academic writing

  • Academic Integrity at MIT, A Handbook for Students
  • Academic writing - Aalto
  • Writing Clinic links - Aalto
entry.summary: march & april, looking forward to summer
